classFeature.name: Metamagic
entries: A nivell 3, you gain the ability to twist your spells to suit your needs. You gain two of the following Metamagic options (escull). You gain another one at 10th and 17th level.
You can use only one Metamagic option on a spell when you cast it, unless otherwise noted.

classFeature.name: Invocacions Èldritx
entries: In your study of occult lore, you have unearthed invocacions èldritx, fragments of forbidden knowledge that imbue you with an abiding magical ability.

A nivell 2, you gain two invocacions èldritx (escull). Your invocation options are detailed at the end of the class description. When you gain certain warlock levels, you gain additional invocations (escull), as shown in the Invocacions Conegudes a la Taula de Bruixot.
A més, quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, pots escollir un dels invocations you know and replace it with another invocation that you could learn at that level.

If an invocació èldritx has prerequisites, you must meet them to learn it. You can learn the invocation at the same time that you meet its prerequisites. A level prerequisite refers to your level en aquesta classe.

subclassFeature.name: Maneuvers
entries: The maneuvers are presented in alphabetical order.

data.activation.condition: Mentre estiguis en fúria, the first creature you hit a cada torn teu with a weapon attack
Quan impactes a una criatura amb un atac armat

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Toc de la Mort

data.activation.condition: When the cleric hits a creature amb un atac cos a cos

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave
Channel Divinity: Knowledge of the Ages
Channel Divinity: Radiance of the Dawn
Channel Divinity: Charm Animals and Plants

data.activation.condition: Whenever you take the Attack action

subclassFeature.name: Rune Carver
entries: {@i tret de Rune Knight a nivell 3}

You can use magic runes to enhance your gear. You learn two runes (escull), from among the runes described below, and each time you gain a level en aquesta classe, you can replace one rune you know with a different one from this feature. Quan pugis de nivell en aquesta classe, you learn additional runes, as shown in the Runes Known table.

Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch a number of objects equal to the number of runes you know, and you inscribe a different rune onto each of the objects. To be eligible, an object must be a weapon, a suit of armor, a shield, a piece of jewelry, or something else you can wear or hold in a hand. Your rune remains on an object fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, and an object can bear only one of your runes at a time.

The following runes are available to you when you learn a rune. If a rune has a level requirement, you must be at least that level en aquesta classe to learn the rune. If a rune requires a saving throw, your Rune Magic save DC equals 8 + el teu bonus de competència + el teu modificador de Constitució.
